name: Monopoly Layer 3 POLY
description: What is the project about? Monopoly Finance is a layered delegated yield farming project on Arbitrum. What makes your project unique? Monopoly earns fee from delegate and depositing fund to 3rd party projects as well as deposit/withdraw fee, then distributes the real yield to the holders through incentivized pool called Golden Key. History of your project. From it's layer 1, Monopoly Finance has worked as high-yield farm and became a field of yield farmer's playground. Now it's on layer 3, with perpetual DEX and IDOs it will be one of the platform Arbitrum users can easily deposit and earn real yield. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Soon, there will be a perpetual future DEX integrated and launch pads for several gem projects. What can your token be used for? From deposit and earn yield of native tokens, to earn real yield of BTC, ETH and etc and participate IDO
